    <h3><span class="trend-location js-trend-location">Worldwide trends</span></h3>

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Today <a href="/theresa_may" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="747807250819981312"><s>@</s><b>theresa_may</b></a> set out what our future partnership with the EU must do:

1. Respect the result of the referendum
2. Be an enduring agreement
3. Protect jobs and security
4. Deliver an outcome consistent with the kind of country we want to be
5. Strengthen our Union of nations<a href="https://t.co/qsMb78Jmtz" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/qsMb78Jmtz</a></p>

      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Greek unemployment rate: 20.9%. Youth unemployment rate: 43.7%. "Roaring health", according to Bloomberg.<a href="https://t.co/6L3ya7HqVG" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/brexit/status/962441818632867840" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/brexit/status/962441818632867840"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/brexit/status/</span><span class="invisible">962441818632867840</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Mark Wallace added,</p>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">.<a href="/johnmcdonnellMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="77234984"><s>@</s><b>johnmcdonnellMP</b></a> trying to pretend Labours renationalisation plan wont cost a penny when in fact it will cost taxpayers hundreds of billions , lead to less investment and worse services<a href="https://t.co/UFXo433c1Q" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.cityam.com/279157/centre-policy-studies-blasts-labours-nationalisation-vow" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.cityam.com/279157/centre-policy-studies-blasts-labours-nationalisation-vow"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">cityam.com/279157/centre-</span><span class="invisible">policy-studies-blasts-labours-nationalisation-vow</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

First of many scalps for Labours new Momentum-led policy board.

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Last Labour govt left UK with deepest peacetime recession in 100 yrs. 

The one before that went cap in hand to the IMF for a bailout. 

At least <a href="/AngelaRayner" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="222748037"><s>@</s><b>AngelaRayner</b></a> admits Labour has learned absolutely nothing. 

Same old Labour.<a href="https://t.co/2QJ7AuzauE" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.politicshome.com/news/uk/political-parties/labour-party/jeremy-corbyn/news/91804/angela-rayner-labours-economic" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://www.politicshome.com/news/uk/political-parties/labour-party/jeremy-corbyn/news/91804/angela-rayner-labours-economic"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">politicshome.com/news/uk/politi</span><span class="invisible">cal-parties/labour-party/jeremy-corbyn/news/91804/angela-rayner-labours-economic</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="937686119650603009" id="stream-item-tweet-937686119650603009" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;937686119650603009&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

        <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="925734472112398337" id="stream-item-tweet-925734472112398337" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;925734472112398337&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/Conservatives" data-user-id="14281853">

      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">.<a href="/theresa_may" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="747807250819981312"><s>@</s><b>theresa_may</b></a> in today's Mail writes For Britain's sake, it's time to tackle the unacceptable face of capitalism<a href="https://t.co/iRu57Lrpos" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://dailym.ai/2izkNgi" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://dailym.ai/2izkNgi"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">dailym.ai/2izkNgi</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

    <div class="AdaptiveMedia&#10;        &#10;        &#10;        is-video&#10;        &#10;        has-autoplayable-media&#10;        ">
      <div class="AdaptiveMedia-container">
          <div class="AdaptiveMedia-video">
  <div class="AdaptiveMedia-videoContainer">
      <div class="PlayableMedia PlayableMedia--video watched">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Craig Bateman Retweeted Model Wminster Soc</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Pleased to see the publication of our first research report following <a href="/hashtag/ChadsQT?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ChadsQT</b></a> - <a href="/Jonathan_Elmer" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="289287194"><s>@</s><b>Jonathan_Elmer</b></a> <a href="/robertabwMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="173089105"><s>@</s><b>robertabwMP</b></a> <a href="/amandahopgoodld" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="861454547151187969"><s>@</s><b>amandahopgoodld</b></a> <a href="/rmarlawrie" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="862762716049625090"><s>@</s><b>rmarlawrie</b></a><a href="https://t.co/Iw8xYoTgPh" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/modelwmnstersoc/status/893064221709279234" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/modelwmnstersoc/status/893064221709279234"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/modelwmnsterso</span><span class="invisible">c/status/893064221709279234</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Craig Bateman added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/ModelWmnsterSoc/status/893064221709279234" data-conversation-id="893064221709279234" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="893064221709279234" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="ModelWmnsterSoc" data-user-id="868902354430681088" href="/ModelWmnsterSoc/status/893064221709279234" data-conversation-id="893064221709279234" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Model Wminster Soc</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>ModelWmnsterSoc</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">We are proud to present our first research report based on feedback given after our <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ChadsQT</b></span> event in June:

<span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.durhamsu.com/groups/model-westminster-society/articles/chadsqt-general-election-question-time-research-report" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://www.durhamsu.com/groups/model-westminster-society/articles/chadsqt-general-election-question-time-research-report"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">durhamsu.com/groups/model-w</span><span class="invisible">estminster-society/articles/chadsqt-general-election-question-time-research-report</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span></div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>

</div>

      </div>
  </button>

      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">Conservatives</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>Conservatives</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Michael Gove Retweeted UK Prime Minister</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">A calm, measured and resolute response to a terrible atrocity<a href="https://t.co/rrgqjsPtL5" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/number10gov/status/871384808177270787" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/number10gov/status/871384808177270787"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/number10gov/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/871384808177270787</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Michael Gove added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/10DowningStreet/status/871384808177270787" data-conversation-id="871384808177270787" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">

      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>

      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>

</div>

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
        <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedVideo" data-nav="embed_video">
          <button type="button" class="dropdown-link"> Embed Video</button>
        </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">4</span>

  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton u-textUserColorHover dropdown-toggle js-dropdown-toggle" type="button" aria-haspopup="true">
      <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="More">
        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">

  <p class="embed-tweet-instructions">Add this Tweet to your website by copying the code below. <a href="https://dev.twitter.com/web/embedded-tweets" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Learn more</a></p>
  <p class="embed-video-instructions">Add this video to your website by copying the code below. <a href="https://dev.twitter.com/web/embedded-tweets" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Learn more</a></p>
  <form class="t1-form">

    <div class="embed-destination-wrapper">
      <div class="embed-overlay embed-overlay-spinner"><div class="embed-overlay-content"></div></div>
      <div class="embed-overlay embed-overlay-error">
        <p class="embed-overlay-content">Hmm, there was a problem reaching the server. <button type="button" class="btn-link retry-embed">Try again?</button></p>
      </div>
      <textarea class="embed-destination js-initial-focus"></textarea>
      <div class="embed-options">
        <div class="embed-include-parent-tweet">
          <label class="t1-label" for="include-parent-tweet">
            <input type="checkbox" id="include-parent-tweet" class="include-parent-tweet" checked="" />

          </label>
        </div>

            Include media
          </label>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </form>

    window.ttft.recordMilestone('page', document.getElementById('swift-page-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('section', document.getElementById('swift-section-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('client_record_time', window.ttft.now());
  }
